tests.test_body:
; Function Attrs: nocallback nofree nosync nounwind willreturn
declare token @llvm.call.preallocated.setup(i32 immarg) #0

; Function Attrs: nocallback nofree nosync nounwind willreturn
declare ptr @llvm.call.preallocated.arg(token, i32 immarg) #0

declare hidden i32 @f(ptr)

declare hidden x86_thiscallcc i32 @g(ptr)

declare hidden coldcc i32 @h(ptr)

declare hidden i32 @j(ptr)

declare hidden i32 @inalloca(ptr inalloca(i32))

declare hidden i32 @preallocated(ptr preallocated(i32))

define void @call_things() {
  %m = alloca i32, align 4
  %1 = call i32 @f(ptr %m)
  %2 = call x86_thiscallcc i32 @g(ptr %m)
  %3 = call coldcc i32 @h(ptr %m)
  %4 = call i32 @j(ptr %m)
  %args = alloca inalloca i32, align 4
  %5 = call i32 @inalloca(ptr inalloca(i32) %args)
  %c = call token @llvm.call.preallocated.setup(i32 1)
  %N = call ptr @llvm.call.preallocated.arg(token %c, i32 0) #1
  %6 = call i32 @preallocated(ptr preallocated(i32) %N) [ "preallocated"(token %c) ]
  ret void
}
